greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number with same prime signature as the n-th divisorial: a(n) = A046523(A007955(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1025
mathematica: Table[If[n == 1, 1, Times @@ MapIndexed[Prime[First@ #2]^#1 &, FactorInteger[Times @@ Divisors@ n][[All, -1]]]], {n, 74}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 22 2017 *)
program: A007955(n) = if(issquare(n, &n), n^numdiv(n^2), n^(numdiv(n)/2)); \\ From _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 11 2011
A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ From _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 22 2017
